name: Legend Of The Super Future Bro's
name_original: Legend Of The Super Future Bro's
description:
This game is a short alpha version 1.0.1 that we made for a school project. In this game you play as  a human with his droid companion  in the future.  You have to complete the levels by switching between players and using them to parcour to the end.

Controls:

W/Space = Jump

A and D = Left and Right

CTRL = switch players

LMB = Shoot

R = Reset Level

Scroll mouse wheel = control menu

Escape = Pause Game

Escape + backspace = Back to main menu

M = Mute
